borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1 - Bay Tree - Front Garden - Approximately 8m in height with a 4m lateral spread. Proposed works: This tree was originally trimmed and kept as a hedge on the front boundary of property. It has since been allowed to grow single stem up to 8m in height. Works is to remove this stem leaving the bay back as a hedge approx 2m in height and with a 4m lateral spread. T2 - Purple Plum - Rear Garden - Approx 8m in height with a 3m lateral spread. Proposed works: Remove to ground level and grind out stump. T3 - Magnolia - Rear Garden- Multi Stemmed Magnolia approx 5m in height and 3.5m lateral spread.Proposed Works: Reduce height by 1.5m and spread by 0.5m leaving a height of 3.5m and lateral spread of 3m.
